data.message:
Please help me someone got into my page and sent a post with my name , my profile . I did click on the top right it usually would have it where you can report it but this one does not . I edit it with a warning not to click on the link . I took a picture but I can't send it to you I will try to tag you I don't understand much my grandchildren helped me get on Facebook please help me get rid of this person this it 
( TIBBON) TY

replies.message: Hey Susan. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2lim2ke. -Joe

How can they if I am set as private and now I'm finding out a lot of people some my friends are being hacked someone is also posting our pictures on message the picture say YouTube and none of us did it
